title: BC端配置文件问题
author: Even585659
txt_content:
115.xxx.217.29:20040是我服IP(带端口)
我的BC配置文件是这样的：
ip_forward: true
network_compression_threshold: 256
stats: e7f65f1b-9080-4ff1-9984-5784c67be986
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
servers:
  登录服:
    address: localhost:20045
    restricted: false
    motd: ''
  lobby:
    address: localhost:20046
    restricted: false
    motd: ''
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
listeners:
- max_players: 2333
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  tab_size: 80
  force_default_server: true
  motd: ''
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25577
  priorities:
  - login
  - login
  - login
permissions:
  default: []
  admin: []
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
                                                                                     connection_throttle: 5000

replies.author: Smile_Sun
replies.txt_content:
query_port: 25577
复制代码也要改为25565.
如果你要改不限制人数多少请改为:
max_players: -1
复制代码  tab_size: 80
复制代码
建议改为60

  priorities:
  - login
  - login
  - login复制代码

改为:
  priorities:
  - 登录服复制代码如果还有什么地方有问题的话请测试转给我

replies.author: Even585659
replies.txt_content:

如果你要改不限制人数多少请改为:
